clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the maintenance treatment of asthma as a prophylactic therapy

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Flunisolide is a synthetic corticosteroid It is administered either as an oral metered dose inhaler for the treatment of asthma or as a nasal spray for treating allergic rhinitis Corticosteroids are naturally occurring hormones that prevent or suppress inflammation and immune responses When given as an intranasal spray flunisolide reduces watery nasal discharge rhinorrhea nasal congestion postnasal drip sneezing and itching oat the back of the throat that are common allergic symptoms
